Method Detail

setUseToolkit

public static void setUseToolkit(boolean useToolkit)
Defines whether the fetcher uses ImageIO or the default Toolkit to load images. Per default the fetcher uses the ImageIO API to create a consistent and extendible result across all platforms. Switching to the Toolkit may be faster but limits the loading to the

Parameters:
useToolkit - true to use the Toolkit, false to use ImageIO

getImage

public RemoteImage getImage(java.net.URL location,
                            AnimationObserver observer)
Creates a image fetch proxy and enqueues the load request

Parameters:
location - the location of the image to load
observer - the image observer to get notified when the image is available
Returns:
the fetcher proxy

openStreamFromURL

public static java.io.InputStream openStreamFromURL(java.net.URL url)
                                             throws java.io.IOException,
                                                    java.net.MalformedURLException
Opens an connection referenced by an URL. Unlike the URL.openConnection() method, this method is able to handle SSL connections as well as redirects.

Parameters:
url - the URL to connect to, must not be NullPointerException
Returns:
a open connection for the URL
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if the connection could not be established
java.net.MalformedURLException - in case the URL is invalid
